name: Finaux Theme v1.3, A New Kind of 4chan CSS.
description:
Have questions, comments, suggestions? Email me at finaux@gmx.com!

This was created on a 1366x768 screen. So its optimized for that.
Tested in chrome, but should work fine for firefox. 

Thanks for 100+ downloads combined for both my themes! Keep on shitposting!

*This CSS is regularly updated, don't forget to update from time to time!*

A simplified and easy to use custom CSS for 4chan.
Set your theme to 'tomorrow' for best results.
